structure.unit: Real And Personal Property And Domestic Relations
Descent And Distribution, Wills, Estates Of Deceased Persons And Absentees, Guardianship, Conservatorship And Trusts
General Provisions Regarding Certain Foreign Fiduciaries

law.text: [ Text of section effective until March 31, 2012. Repealed by 2008, 521, Sec. 20. See 2008, 521, Sec. 44 as amended by 2010, 409, Sec. 23 and 2011, 224.] Nothing in this chapter shall limit the jurisdiction of the probate court under other provisions of the General Laws.
